magmacore.message.update_available: Eine neue Version von %s ist verfügbar!
magmacore.message.reposts_warning:
Sites like 9minecraft.net, mc-mod.net, etc. are known for reuploading mod files without permissions. 
These sites will also contain a bunch of ads, to try to make money from mods they did not create.
magmacore.message.reposts_note_intro: For you, this can mean any of the following:
magmacore.message.reposts_malware: - Modified versions of mods, which may contain malware & viruses
magmacore.message.reposts_steal: - Having your information stolen from malicious ads
magmacore.message.reposts_broken: - Old and broken mod versions that can corrupt your world
magmacore.message.reposts_authors: - Taking money and views away from the real authors, which may cause them to stop making mods
magmacore.configuration.title: Magma Core Konfiguration
magmacore.configuration.update-checker.t: Activate whether the game should check at every world start whether your mod matches the latest version
magmacore.configuration.supporter_reward: Enables ingame rewards on first spawn for Patreons and supporters
magmacore.configuration.mod_reposts_info: Activate whether the game should show the mod reposts info the first time the game launches. To pack makers: Please support us!
magmacore.item.certificate: Danke dass du mich in meiner Arbeit unterstützt!
